sect1.title: Best Practices Abstract
sect1.para: This document describes best practices for &susemgr;. This information has been collected from many successful SUSE Manager real world project implementations and includes information from discussions and collaboration with product management and engineering. This document is a collection of general guidelines and should be used as such. Although the documentation team strives to keep &susemgr; documentation current, SUSE Manager is constantly evolving and therefore sections of this documentation may be outdated.

sect1.title: What is SUSE Manager?
sect1.para: &susemgr; Server is a full life-cycle management tool which allows you to efficiently deploy, manage and provision large numbers of Linux based client systems. It provides automated and cost-effective software and asset management and may be setup in both connected and disconnected modes. &susemgr; is fully compatible with Red Hat Satellite Server and offers seamless management of both SUSEÂ® Linux Enterprise and Red Hat Enterprise Linux client systems.
